trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ524_02775_SEQ_00<tab>Ogodei has a favor to ask of you.
TEXT_STMBDZ524_02775_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the mammoth hides and dried leaves to Ogodei.
TEXT_STMBDZ524_02775_OGODEI_000_000<tab><var 08 E905 ((Madam)) ((Sir)) /var>─do you happen to have a moment? If you do, could you lend me a hand?

TEXT_STMBDZ524_02775_OGODEI_000_001<tab>A new child is about to join our family and I would like to make a blanket with which to keep him warm. I, however, cannot stray too far from here, for I must keep a watch over his mother.

TEXT_STMBDZ524_02775_OGODEI_000_002<tab>Might I ask that you procure the raw materials with which I can make this blanket? To the northeast of here are a herd of mammoths. Please hunt down three and bring me back their hides.

TEXT_STMBDZ524_02775_OGODEI_000_003<tab>I would also ask that you collect some dried leaves. I will use them to make a tanning mixture. These can be found in the northern reaches, at the base of the shrubs that grow there.
TEXT_STMBDZ524_02775_OGODEI_000_004<tab>As soon as you get them, please hurry back. I am certain the baby will be arriving soon and I hope to welcome him into the world with a blanket.
TEXT_STMBDZ524_02775_OGODEI_000_005<tab>I need for you to bring me three mammoth hides and some dried leaves with which to tan them.
TEXT_STMBDZ524_02775_OGODEI_000_011<tab>Fantastic! With this, I shall make the child a blanket to shelter him from the bite of the wind and frigid nights.

TEXT_STMBDZ524_02775_OGODEI_000_012<tab>Several times throughout the year, freezing climes will sweep over the Steppe and claim the lives of our young. <sigh> The loss of a newborn sheep is always terribly tragic.
TEXT_STMBDZ524_02775_OGODEI_000_013<tab>Hm? Oh, yes. When I say “child,” I do not mean my own, of course. Hahaha! My apologies. Perhaps I should have mentioned that little detail earlier.
TEXT_STMBDZ524_02775_OGODEI_000_014<tab>Your deeds, however, are no less noble for because of you, this lamb is sure to lead a long and wonderful life.
